page.title: 06Clubs 1
page.content: {Freemasons:}Meeting held in King Arthur's Hall twice monthly. Ladies meet in the Ladies Masonic Hall three times a year. { {Old Peoples Club:}A senior citizen's club meets once a week in the Methodists' Church Hall. {Womens' Institute:}there are two different groups in Tintagel; Tintagel W.I - meets Thursday afternoon, Trevena W.I - meets once a month , Monday evenings. {Tintagel Orpheus Male Voice Choir:} Conductor Mr.M Rowe, accompianist Mrs.S Flower.Choir has 30 members.They meet each Tuesday 7.30 - 9.30 pm,at the Methodist Hall.
